    • getCodingBySystem

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding getCodingBySystem(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, String system)
      Retrieval of the fhir Codings in a list that uses the given Coding.getSystem().

    • getCodeBySystem

      public static String getCodeBySystem(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, String system)
      Does the given list of fhir Codings contain a value that uses the given Coding.getSystem().

    • isCodeInCodesystem

      public static boolean isCodeInCodesystem(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, Collection<String> codeSystemEntries, String system)
      Does the given list of fhir Codings contain a value that is part of the given code system.

    • isCodeInCodesystem

      public static boolean isCodeInCodesystem(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, Collection<String> codeSystemEntries, Collection<String> systems)
      Checks if any of the given Codings contains a value that is part of at least one of the specified code systems.
      Parameters:
      codings - A list of FHIR Coding codings to check.
      codeSystemEntries - A collection of valid codes to check against.
      systems - A collection of code systems to search within.
      Returns:
      true if at least one code from codings exists in any of the given systems and is present in codeSystemEntries, otherwise false.

    • isCodeInCodesystem

      public static boolean isCodeInCodesystem(String code, Collection<String> codeSystemEntries)
      Does the given fhir Coding contain a value that is part of the given code system.
      Returns:
      True is the code is not null and also part of the given code system.

    • hasCode

      public static boolean hasCode(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Checks whether the given fhir Coding got a code with an additional non-null check.

    • hasCodeBySystem

      public static boolean hasCodeBySystem(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, String system)
      Checking if there is a fhir Coding in the list that got the given system.

    • getFirstCoding

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding getFirstCoding(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings)
      This method will return null instead of creating an empty object like in the official hapi fhir method CodeableConcept.getCodingFirstRep().

    • getCodeOfFirstCoding

      public static String getCodeOfFirstCoding(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings)
      This method will return null instead of creating an empty object like in the official hapi fhir method CodeableConcept.getCodingFirstRep().

    • isCodeOfFirstCodingEquals

      public static boolean isCodeOfFirstCodingEquals(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, String referenceCode)
      This method retrieves the first Coding.getCode() of the first Coding and checks if it matches the passed reference code.

    • getCodeOfFirstCodeableConcept

      public static String getCodeOfFirstCodeableConcept(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept> codeableConcepts)
      This method will retrieve the first code found of the first CodeableConcept found in a given list.
      Returns:
      This method will return null instead of creating an empty object as in the official hapi fhir method CodeableConcept.getCodingFirstRep().

    • isCodeOfFirstCodeableConceptEquals

      public static boolean isCodeOfFirstCodeableConceptEquals(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept> codeableConcepts, String referenceCode)
      This method retrieves the first Coding.getCode() of the first Coding and checks if it matches the passed reference code.

    • isCodeInCodeableConcepts

      public static boolean isCodeInCodeableConcepts(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept> codeableConcepts, String system, List<String> referenceCodes)
      This method checks whether a given set of CodeableConcept contains any of the codes in the given code system, to the given system.

    • isCodeInAnyCodeableConcepts

      public static boolean isCodeInAnyCodeableConcepts(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept> codeableConcepts, List<String> referenceCodes)
      This method checks whether a given set of CodeableConcept contains any of the codes without checking the Coding.getSystem() entry.

    • isCodeInAnyCoding

      public static boolean isCodeInAnyCoding(List<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> codings, Collection<String> referenceCodes)
      Checks whether any of the given Coding entries contains a code that matches any of the provided reference codes, without considering the Coding.getSystem() entry.
      Returns:
      true if at least one coding has a code that exists in referenceCodes, otherwise false

    • isCodeInAnyCodeableConcepts

      public static boolean isCodeInAnyCodeableConcepts(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept codeableConcept, List<String> referenceCodes)
